title: Help Riot
body: Recently I just bought a new razer laptop, and I'm having some problems to play the game. All the items is so small and I can barely read anything, this might be cause by the size of my laptop which is only 12.5in. Is there anyway to adjust the size of the items? I took a screenshot but do not know how to upload it...

replies.body: Congrats on your new laptop!  It's important to make sure that your Windows and every driver is up to date to make sure everything is running smoothly.  If your video driver isn't updated, then you may have few options to increase your resolution or even play league at all.  Use our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for steps towards tuning up your PC for league.  Let me know if you have any questions!
